parameters.diag.time: times since diagnosis in months at entry to trial.
parameters.Karn: Karnofsky score of patient's performance on a scale of 0 to 100.
parameters.stime: survival or follow-up time in days.

reference:
Kalbfleisch, J.D. and Prentice R.L. (1980)
The Statistical Analysis of Failure Time Data.
Wiley.
description:
Description
Veteran's Administration lung cancer trial from Kalbfleisch & Prentice.
title: Veteran's Administration Lung Cancer Trial
